component.name: systemd Pilot
component.summary: A graphical tool for managing systemd services

description.p: systemd Pilot is a modern graphical tool built with Rust and GTK that allows you to manage systemd services both locally and remotely. This rewrite provides better performance, memory safety, and enhanced user experience.

ul.li: Start, stop, restart, enable and disable services with real-time status updates
View service logs with syntax highlighting and filtering
Remote service management via SSH with secure credential storage
Create and edit systemd service files with templates
Automatic dark/light theme detection with manual toggle
Multi-host management with connection status indicators

description.p: Built with Rust for superior performance and reliability, systemd Pilot is the modern way to manage your system services.
Major rewrite in Rust with GTK

ul.li: Complete rewrite from Python to Rust for better performance and memory safety
Modern GTK interface with improved responsiveness
Enhanced remote host management with better SSH handling
Improved theme support with automatic system theme detection
Better error handling and user feedback
Enhanced security with proper credential management
